sys_metadata_link.payload:
public true false 933085a493730300eb08925cf67ffb35 <p>Delete a user from Active Directory (AD).</p> <p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>User Name</strong> - Name of the user you wish to delete.</li> </ul> <p>If the specified user does not exist in AD, the Status output will be set to "Error" and the Error Message output will be populated.</p> <p><b>Outputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Status</strong> - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure in AD occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> </ul> <p><b>Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>Invalid User Name</li> <li>User Name cannot be empty</li> <li>Invalid Credentials for host</li> <li>Invalid hostname in connection or Host not reachable from Mid server</li> <li>Host Credentials incorrect. Authentication Error in MID Server</li> </ul> <p>To use this action, a corresponding AD Connection and Credential must be created and associated with the AD Connection & Credential Alias. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a></p> true delete_user [{"name":"{{action.ah_user_name}}","label":"action➛User published sys_hub_action_type_definition admin 2018-01-18 06:34:02 global / 1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b 9 Delete User d1d1c988932b03005d55925cf67ffb63 read d1d1c988932b03005d55925cf67ffb63 sys_hub_action_type_definition_1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b admin 2019-09-12 12:20:58 false 1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b description es admin 2022-07-06 04:59:14 d43043012fec9110d8a4d5f62799b691 0 admin 2022-07-06 04:59:14 sys_hub_action_type_base <p>Eliminar un usuario de Active Directory (AD).</p> <p><b>Entradas:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Nombre de usuario</strong>: nombre del usuario que desea eliminar.</li> </ul> <p>Si el usuario especificado no existe en AD, la salida de estado se establecerá en "Error" y se rellenará la salida del mensaje de error.</p> <p><b>Salidas:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Estado</strong>: se establecerá en "Correcto" si la solicitud se realiza correctamente o en "Error" si se produce un error en AD.</li> <li><strong>Mensaje de error</strong>: motivo del error. Solo se rellena cuando se produce un error.</li> </ul> <p><b>Mensajes de error:</b></p> <ul> <li>Nombre de usuario no válido</li> <li>El nombre de usuario no puede estar vacío</li> <li>Las credenciales del host no son válidas</li> <li>El nombre de host en la conexión no es válido o el host no es accesible desde el servidor MID</li> <li>Las credenciales del host no son correctas. Error de autenticación en el servidor MID</li> </ul> <p>Para usar esta acción, debe crearse una conexión y credencial de AD correspondiente y asociarse con el alias de conexión y credencial de AD. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Más información</a></p> <p><b>Nota</b>: Requiere una suscripción para uso en producción. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Leer más</a></p> 1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b name es admin 2022-07-06 04:59:14 5c3043012fec9110d8a4d5f62799b690 0 admin 2022-07-06 04:59:14 sys_hub_action_type_base Eliminar usuario sys_hub_action_type_definition 1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b 1 sys_variable_value admin 2019-09-12 12:20:51 06e222d67333730044022ea3c4f6a7c6 0 admin 2019-09-12 12:20:51 a7033b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb7c Error Message 1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b admin 2018-01-18 06:34:04 78764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb95 0 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:04 var__m_sys_hub_action_output_1c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb0b

Credential resolved via connection alias or credential alias. This can be used in conjunction with any cmd-let which support credential parameter eg. New-PSSession -credential $cred # $log_info mid property "mid.property.powershell.log_info" set on instance to enable debugging. So it's a flag available to act on and add any verbose logging if they want to in their script c54323fa3721030003a08fb77e41f16e sys_hub_step_instance a8764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb31 155 sys_variable_value admin 2018-01-18 06:34:03 e4764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb41 0 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:03 \ADSpoke\ActionRemoveADObject.ps1 acd190d13731030003a08fb77e41f17e application a8764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb31 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:18 13033b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb4a 0 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:18 var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_486f577a3721030003a08fb77e41f1d6

106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:03 ec764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb49 2 d1d1c988932b03005d55925cf67ffb63 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:19 sys_hub_step_instance ec764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb49 200 sys_variable_value admin 2018-01-18 06:34:03 7c764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb74 0 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:03 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { function deleteObjectErrorHandler(inputs, outputs){ outputs.Status = "Error"; if(inputs.errorMessage.indexOf("The (&(objectClass=User)(samaccountname=)) search filter is invalid.") != -1) outputs.ErrorMessage = "User Name cannot be empty"; var exp = new RegExp(/\(&\(objectClass=User\)\(samaccountname=.*\)\) could not be found/); if(exp.test(inputs.errorMessage) || inputs.errorMessage.indexOf("Error occured while parsing Json string to map") != -1) outputs.ErrorMessage = "Invalid User Name"; if(inputs.errorMessage.indexOf("Authentication failure with the user") != -1) outputs.ErrorMessage = "Invalid Credentials for host"; if(inputs.errorMessage.indexOf("The RPC server is unavailable") != -1) outputs.ErrorMessage = "Invalid hostname in connection or Host not reachable from Mid server"; if(inputs.errorMessage.indexOf("Failed to access target system. Please check credentials and firewall settings on the target system to ensure accessibility: Access is denied.") != -1) outputs.ErrorMessage = "Host Credentials incorrect. Authentication Error in MID Server"; return outputs; } function isAllEmpty(inputs, outputs) { if(!inputs.errorMessage && !inputs.errorCode && !inputs.output) return true; else return false; } if(isAllEmpty(inputs, outputs)) outputs.Status = "Success"; else outputs = deleteObjectErrorHandler(inputs, outputs); })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b sys_hub_step_instance ec764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb49 400 sys_variable_value admin 2018-06-26 05:58:19 ab033b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb6a 0 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:19 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 application ec764d2893730300eb08925cf67ffb49 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:19 2b033b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb6a 0 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:19 var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7

6133fb6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffba8 1 admin 2019-09-12 12:20:51 Success public false 933085a493730300eb08925cf67ffb35 <p>Delete a user from Active Directory (AD).</p> <p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>User Name</strong> - Name of the user you wish to delete.</li> </ul> <p>If the specified user does not exist in AD, the Status output will be set to "Error" and the Error Message output will be populated.</p> <p><b>Outputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Status</strong> - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure in AD occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> </ul> <p><b>Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>Invalid User Name</li> <li>User Name cannot be empty</li> <li>Invalid Credentials for host</li> <li>Invalid hostname in connection or Host not reachable from Mid server</li> <li>Host Credentials incorrect. Authentication Error in MID Server</li> </ul> <p>To use this action, a corresponding AD Connection and Credential must be created and associated with the AD Connection & Credential Alias. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a></p> delete_user [{"name":"{{action.ah_user_name}}","label":"action➛User sys_hub_action_type_snapshot admin 2018-01-18 06:34:16 global / 3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9 2 d1d1c988932b03005d55925cf67ffb63 read d1d1c988932b03005d55925cf67ffb63 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:24 false 3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9 description es admin 2022-07-06 05:00:51 889083412fec9110d8a4d5f62799b6bd 0 admin 2022-07-06 05:00:51 sys_hub_action_type_base <p>Eliminar un usuario de Active Directory (AD).</p> <p><b>Entradas:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Nombre de usuario</strong>: nombre del usuario que desea eliminar.</li> </ul> <p>Si el usuario especificado no existe en AD, la salida de estado se establecerá en "Error" y se rellenará la salida del mensaje de error.</p> <p><b>Salidas:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Estado</strong>: se establecerá en "Correcto" si la solicitud se realiza correctamente o en "Error" si se produce un error en AD.</li> <li><strong>Mensaje de error</strong>: motivo del error. Solo se rellena cuando se produce un error.</li> </ul> <p><b>Mensajes de error:</b></p> <ul> <li>Nombre de usuario no válido</li> <li>El nombre de usuario no puede estar vacío</li> <li>Las credenciales del host no son válidas</li> <li>El nombre de host en la conexión no es válido o el host no es accesible desde el servidor MID</li> <li>Las credenciales del host no son correctas. Error de autenticación en el servidor MID</li> </ul> <p>Para usar esta acción, debe crearse una conexión y credencial de AD correspondiente y asociarse con el alias de conexión y credencial de AD. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Más información</a></p> <p><b>Nota</b>: Requiere una suscripción para uso en producción. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Leer más</a></p> 3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9 name es admin 2022-07-06 05:00:51 009083412fec9110d8a4d5f62799b6bd 0 admin 2022-07-06 05:00:51 sys_hub_action_type_base Eliminar usuario sys_hub_action_type_snapshot 3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9 1 sys_variable_value admin 2019-09-12 12:20:58 bfe2a2d67333730044022ea3c4f6a75c 0 admin 2019-09-12 12:20:58 49137b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb9a Error Message 3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:18 1c86cd2893730300eb08925cf67ffb46 0 admin 2018-01-18 06:34:18 var__m_sys_hub_action_output_3b768d2893730300eb08925cf67ffbc9

Authentication Error in MID Server"; return outputs; } function isAllEmpty(inputs, outputs) { if(!inputs.errorMessage && !inputs.errorCode && !inputs.output) return true; else return false; } if(isAllEmpty(inputs, outputs)) outputs.Status = "Success"; else outputs = deleteObjectErrorHandler(inputs, outputs); })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b sys_hub_step_instance 4886cd2893730300eb08925cf67ffb07 400 sys_variable_value admin 2018-06-26 05:58:25 81137b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb89 0 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:25 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 application 4886cd2893730300eb08925cf67ffb07 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:25 01137b6b93ba130079b5925cf67ffb89 0 admin 2018-06-26 05:58:25 var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7
